title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.13 - Extensions of time to answer or reply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.13 - Extensions of time to answer or reply

State Regulations

No extension of time to answer the statement of appeal or
to reply to an answer will be granted by the appeal board unless timely
application is made therefor and good cause shown. Such application shall be in
writing and shall be served and filed not later than three days prior to the
date on which the time to answer or reply will expire. Time to answer or reply
may not be extended by stipulation of the parties or their
counsel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
